title: Welcome to Note Taker
text:
Welcome to Note Taker, built with Express.

To use this application, simply write out a name and body for your note, then click the Save icon in the upper right corner. You can recall a note by clicking on it in the list to the left, write a new note by clicking on the Pencil icon (but careful, it will erase any unsaved data), or delete an unneeded note by clicking on its respective Trash icon.
